title: Edit launch command to lower video receive resolution?
body:
### Describe the feature

Can someone help me lower video receive resolution via launch command? 

### Motivation

Hi there

Can anyone help me edit my launch command for Teams so that it runs on a much lower video receive resolution?

I ask because I cannot find any settings to edit in the application itself. I only have a low-megabit internet connection, and the high quality of the received Teams video is causing lag and delay.

I also ask because I was able to edit the launch command to disable GPU, which solved a blurry video problem I kept running into. If there is a command for that, Iâ€™m hoping that there will be a command to drop the receive video resolution to super-low res.

Here is the launch command as it stands:

**env BAMF_DESKTOP_FILE_HINT=/var/lib/snapd/desktop/applications/teams-for-linux_teams-for-linux.desktop /var/lib/snapd/snap/bin/teams-for-linux %U disable-gpu**

Thanks

### Alternatives

_No response_

### Additional context

_No response_
